entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 10:42 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:42 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
